text.text_translated:
The book is called 'Life of Pi'. It tells an amazing story. It is about a young boy named Pi. He is from India. His ship sank. Pi was in a small boat in the Pacific Ocean. A wild tiger was in the boat with him. Pi was trapped with the tiger.
Yann Martel wrote the book. He is from Canada. This is his third book. It came out in 2001. Many people bought it. Over seven million copies sold all over the world. It won many prizes. People can read it in 41 languages. Yann Martel's father worked for the government in other countries. So, Yann lived in many places as a child. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France, and Mexico.

People changed it into 41 other languages. Yann Martel's father worked in other countries. So, Yann lived in many places as a child. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France, and Mexico.
